name: Save Coconut Land
description:
A short platformer about a coconut trying to save his home from aliens coming from an icy planet. This ia a small game I made for a winter themed Game Jam. The game has an english (EN-US) and a brazilian portuguese (PT-BR) version.

"Coconut Land was a peaceful and warm place, just the way the coconuts liked it. But on a frightening day, the terrifying and icy aliens from Planet Geloid invaded the place with the aim of turning it into an endless winter. When everything seemed to be lost, the old and wise Elder Coconut of the Mountains (yes, that's his name) went to Coconut City and found Coquito, a young coconut willing to do whatever it takes to save Coconut Land."

  • Use the arrow keys to move and jump
  • Be careful, using the boots you will be very fast and it will be difficult to stop!
  • Don't fall into the water or touch the aliens so that you don't lose your lives and end up frozen

Hope you enjoy :)

Credits:

Game & Art by mattks92
Music & Sound FX CC0 from OpenGameArt.org
PT-BR TTS Voice from Voz Letícia F123 (modified)
